verbose_text: Furthermore, we utilize VPS34-IN1 to demonstrate that Vps34 plays a role in regulating the phosphorylation and activity of the SGK3 (serum- and glucocorticoid regulated protein kinase-3), which is the only protein kinase known to possess a selective PtdIns (3) P binding PX domain.
evidence: phosphorylation and activity of the SGK3
